# cancel

**Type Property**

A system-provided option that cancel the app intent.

## Declaration

```swift
static var cancel: IntentChoiceOption { get }
```

## Discussion

Selecting this option causes the `requestChoice(between:dialog:)` method to throw a cancellation error.
title: cancel
